Aremis::

"Yes sir"said the femme while she transformed to her futuristic 
silver car "Please help Jetv, he's injured"

Artemis followed decepticons




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> --- Pacifix / Scattershot / Afterburner / Nosecone / Crossroads / 
> Swoop ---
> 
> Pacifix turns to face Tremmor, having just picked him out, only to 
> catch a destabalizer shot in the shoulder, "Ughhnn," he grunts as 
> he is hit, and starts to feel his equilibrium going crazy. He 
> struggles to stay standing and yells to his Autobots, "If they are 
> leaving, let them leave, we don't want to attract any unwanted 
> attention." He goes to one knee, but slowly begins to recover.
> 
> Swoop exits the base, and gains some altitude. He curves around 
> and fires two missiles at Tremmor, then before he can fire another 
> round, Pacifix's words hit him. Reluctantly, he heads over to 
> Grimlock and remains airborn, circling around him. "Me Swoop 
> want to crush Decepticons..." 
> 
> Afterburner speeds out of the base, transforms and starts firing on 
> Caliburst. "I'll knock the idiot out of the sky." 
> 
> Nosecone still hasn't gotten out of the base.
> 
> Scattershot runs out in time to here Pacifix's words, he motions 
for 
> the Technobots to ceasefire and return to base.
> 
> Crossroads watches Grimlock but is reluctant to fire, he waits for 
> Pacifix to continue expecting someone to get a spy mission. He 
> doesn't know how Grimlock will react, but he expects the worst.
> 
> Pacifix doesn't dissapoint Crossroads. After recovering from the 
> destablizer, he gives new orders, "Ok, sicne we've been found, 
> there are new orders. Artemis, follow those two Decepticons to 
> their base. As soon as you find their base, return to me and 
report. 
> Technobots, we need those base defenses up NOW. Grimlock, 
> you and your dinobots will be needed to make sure that the 
> Technobots get the defenses up quickly, and withough 
> harrasement. Crossroads, you go with Grimlock. Repugnus, I want 
> you to hide on that mountain over there," He indicates one of the 
> northerly mountains surrounding the Autobot crash site, "and act 
> as a sentry until the base has been set up. Dion, watch the ship, 
> and make sure that nothing sneaks in. Hoist is inside fixing the 
> ship's onboard computers and we need those up and running. JetV, 
> are you ok?" He quieries the damaged bot. Noticing Crotale's 
> anxious looks, he consoles the bot, "Don't worry Crotale you'll get 
> your chance later. Right now, you're with me, we're going to find 
> out wha-- HEY!" Pacifix spots Beachcomber and automaticly 
> recognizes him, for who is is. "Beachcomber! We weren't sure if 
> you and your group were still here. Where are Firedrill and 
> Cliffjumper? Oh, nevermind," He says as he spots Cliffjumper. "Are 
> you ok?"
> 
> 
> ooC: Note that those missiles in the episodes went into the water 
> and didn't start already underwater at a significant depth.
> 
> On 23 Jul 2001, at 14:14, gunthers@t... wrote:
> 
> > Crotale followed out behind Pacifix, eager to show his skill in 
> > battle.  
> > 
> > Slag roared out right beside his dino bot leader. "Lets burn them 
to
> > shreds Grimlock. "  He said shooting a blast of fire at Tremor.  
> > 
> > JetV crouched behind a hill.  "Aww, my back" he said said, slowly
> > taking out his rifle and shooting four blasts at Slugslinger.
> > ------------------------------------------------------------------
----
> > ----------
> > 
> > Tremor looked at the bots coming out of hte ship. Not thinking 
> > about the odds he faced began shooting.  Firing fourblast of his
> > Gyroscopic destabilizer at Pacifix, Artemis, Dion, and another 
stray
> > shot whizzing at Slugslinger.  "Die all of you , hhahaha" he said 
as
> > he fired his plasma rifle at the Technobots, one shot at each.
> >
